Topic.Title: Removing the top border from an offline quest game.

Posts.EditableText:
Hello everybody, I was wondering if there is a possible way to remove the top bar of an offline quest game (that I made, so I can alter the code). I'd rather not see the File, Edit, Tool and Help buttons.

Thank you in advance and hopefully, someone knows the trick to this.

Take care

-Mal
